body:
Comment 1: 
On line 7, r1 is declared, using short variable declaration syntax, beginning and
ending within the scope of the enclosing block, where it is not used.

{
    v0, r1 := 1, 3    // line 7
    f(v0)
}

Isn't this is a duplicate of issue #377: := can shadow named return variables (and others)
